ActivityVerb.php
ActivityVerbAbstraction class for an Activity Verb
ActivityVerbUtility class to hold a bunch of constant defining default verb types
canonicalHelp function which will return the canonical link for a given Activity verb.

ActivityVerb

Utility class to hold a bunch of constant defining default verb types

Defines

  • POST - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/post’
  • SHARE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/share’
  • SAVE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/save’
  • FAVORITE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/favorite’
  • LIKE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/like’ (This is a synonym of favorite)
  • PLAY - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/play’
  • FOLLOW - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/follow’
  • FRIEND - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/make-friend’
  • JOIN - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/join’
  • TAG - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/tag’
  • DELETE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/delete’
  • UPDATE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/update’
  • UNFAVORITE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/unfavorite’
  • UNLIKE - ‘http://activitystrea.ms/schema/1.0/unlike’ (This is a synonym of unfavorite)
  • UNFOLLOW - ‘http://ostatus.org/schema/1.0/unfollow’
  • LEAVE - ‘http://ostatus.org/schema/1.0/leave’
  • UNTAG - ‘http://ostatus.org/schema/1.0/untag’
  • UPDATE_PROFILE - ‘http://ostatus.org/schema/1.0/update-profile’

canonical

static function canonical($verb)

Help function which will return the canonical link for a given Activity verb.

Parameters

  • verb

Returns

  • string
static function canonical($verb)
Help function which will return the canonical link for a given Activity verb.
